person.persName: Columbus Dodson (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of David N. Dodson, Sr., and Mary Dodson. Farmhand in Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1860. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Ballard County in 1860. Served in the 14th Iowa Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from July 8, 1863 to August 8, 1865.
